title: How do I delete the League of Legends Screensaver folder from my computer's C drive?
body:
I've already uninstalled the program from my computer, but when I try to delete the folder it says that it's running in another program, therefore I cannot delete it. 

What I did next was open up my screensaver settings and disabled all screensavers, and then I tried to delete the folder, but it was still running...?

I then tried to set the screensaver to the LoL screensaver, and a pop up occurs. It says it cannot find the files needed to run the LoL screensaver as the specific location. Which means it's gone. I've already deleted it. 

So what do I do, how come I cannot delete this folder when I've already uninstalled the program? What can it possibly be running in??

replies.body: If your PC has since been restarted and the issue persists, then let us take a closer look through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will check this out with you, and we'll reply asap!
